casebody.data:
GILREATH
v.
NCDHHR. No. 310A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 12, 2006. David G. Schiller, Raleigh, for Teresa S. Gilreath.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of July 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant shall have up to and including the 25th day of August 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of July 2006."
